title: In 'The Buried Giant,' Exhausted Medieval Travelers 'Can't Go On,' But So 'Go On'
teaser: Kazuo Ishiguro's latest recalls the plays and novels of Samuel Beckett. It's a masterful blend of fantasy, Arthurian romance, myth, legend and postmodern absurdity â€” and it's unforgettable.
